name: The Lost Cookie
description:
The Lost Cookie is a crazy game! You go through different levels and make it to the end! Best of all its free!

Rules:

Dont Die

Have Fun

Report Bugs: https://goo.gl/forms/SbNEMDkzh08aswMc2

Feedback: https://goo.gl/forms/QMYMYlEOqdl2xOrL2

Inspirational People

Sean McLoughlin (Jacksepticeye)

Jordan Maron (CaptainSparklez)

Mark Fischbach (Markiplier)

Matthew Patrick (MatPat)

James Rallison (TheOdd1sOut)

These people have cheered me up on a bad day; Helped me relax from everyday stress, and have inspired me to do my best work in day to day life. Thanks Sean, Jordan, Mark, Matthew, and James!
